剭字的基本解释

剭
wū
诛杀（指古代贵族、大臣在屋内受刑，区别于平民在市上受刑）。

剭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》烏谷切，入屋，影。］
诛杀。专指古之王公大臣伏刑于户内，以别于平民受戮市中。

剭字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剭； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页142第18
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏谷切，音屋。【廣韻】誅也。【前漢·班固敘傳】底剭鼎臣。【註】服䖍曰：剭者，厚?。謂重誅也。又通屋。【周禮·秋官·司烜氏】邦若屋誅。【註】謂所殺不於市，而以適甸師氏。又【集韻】【韻會】?乙角切，音渥。【博雅】?也。

剭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
剭字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
wū
Punishment (referring to ancient nobles and ministers who were tortured in houses, which is different from civilians who were tortured in the city).
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guang Yun" Wu Gu cut, enter the house, shadow. ]
Punish. It refers specifically to the ancient princes and ministers ambushing indoors, to distinguish them from civilians in the slaughtered city.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Sword Department] 　剭; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 142-18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Wu Guqie, Sound House. [Guang Yun] Zhu Ye. [Previous Han·Bangguxu Biography] Dingchen at the end. [Note] The server said: The spoiler, thick? That is also heavy punishment. Go through the house again. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Sixuan Clan】Bang Ruowu Zhu. [Note] It is said that it cannot be killed in the city, but Shidian Shishi. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Yi Jiao cut, sound wandering. [Bo Ya]? Also.
